pilots.name: "Killer"
pilots.caption: Dependable Closer
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, if the defender has 2 or fewer hull remaining, you may roll 1 additional attack die. If you do, gain 1 deplete token after rolling attack dice.

shipAbility.name: Versatile Frame
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Torpedo] or [Missile] upgrade. While your revealed maneuver is blue, add white [Boost] to your action bar.

pilots.name: "Drift"
pilots.caption: CT-1020
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 performs an attack, if you have exactly 1 non-lock red token or exactly 1 orange token, that ship may reroll 1 attack die.

shipAbility.name: Versatile Frame
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Torpedo] or [Missile] upgrade. While your revealed maneuver is blue, add white [Boost] to your action bar.

pilots.name: "Boost"
pilots.caption: CT4860
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is a friendly ship at range 0-1 whose revealed maneuver is blue, you may perform a [Boost] action.

shipAbility.name: Versatile Frame
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Torpedo] or [Missile] upgrade. While your revealed maneuver is blue, add white [Boost] to your action bar.

pilots.name: "Stub"
pilots.caption: Scrappy Flier
pilots.ability: While you defend, if the speed of your revealed maneuver is even, roll 1 additional defende die. While you perform a primary attack, if the speed of your revealed maneuver is odd, roll 1 additional attack die.

shipAbility.name: Versatile Frame
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Torpedo] or [Missile] upgrade. While your revealed maneuver is blue, add white [Boost] to your action bar.

pilots.name: "Hawk"
pilots.caption: Valkyrie 2929
pilots.ability: At the start of the end phase, each friendly ship at range 0-1 that has a revealed maneuver of speed 3-5 may gain 1 strain token to perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action.

shipAbility.name: Versatile Frame
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Torpedo] or [Missile] upgrade. While your revealed maneuver is blue, add white [Boost] to your action bar.

pilots.name: "Slider"
pilots.caption: Evasive Aviator
pilots.ability: When you reveal a [2 [Bank Left]] or [2 [Bank Right]] maneuver, you may spend 2 [Charge] to execute it as a sideslip.

shipAbility.name: Versatile Frame
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Torpedo] or [Missile] upgrade. While your revealed maneuver is blue, add white [Boost] to your action bar.

pilots.name: "Warthog"
pilots.caption: Veteran of Kadavo
pilots.ability: After you or a friendly non-limited ship at range 0-2 are destroyed during the Engagement Phase, that ship is not removed until the end of that phase.

shipAbility.name: Versatile Frame
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Torpedo] or [Missile] upgrade. While your revealed maneuver is blue, add white [Boost] to your action bar.
